org.apache.directory.server.dhcp.service.manager

Class LeaseManagerDhcpService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.directory.server.dhcp.service.AbstractDhcpReplyFactory
      • org.apache.directory.server.dhcp.service.AbstractDhcpService
        • org.apache.directory.server.dhcp.service.manager.LeaseManagerDhcpService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DhcpService

    public class LeaseManagerDhcpService
extends AbstractDhcpService
    Wraps a LeaseManager as a DhcpService. This gives slightly more convenience and automatic options management at the expense of very little loss of flexibility. This approach is generally recommended.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.apache.directory.server.dhcp.service.AbstractDhcpReplyFactory
